Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Luckymaxer
Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
function OnChanged(Property) if Property == "Enabled" then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:connect(OnChanged)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle") Mesh = Handle:WaitForChild("Mesh")
Fire = Handle:WaitForChild("Fire")
HitScript = script:WaitForChild("HitScript")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
NinjaStars = { Meshes = {159689261, 159689271}, Textures = {159689289} }
Grip = CFrame.new(-0.550000012, 0.300000012, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 1, 0, 0)
FireRate = 0.5 Power = 42
function RandomizeStar() Mesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=" .. NinjaStars.Meshes[math.random(1, #NinjaStars.Meshes)] Mesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=" .. NinjaStars.Textures[math.random(1, #NinjaStars.Textures)] end
function ThrowStar(Start, Vector) if Start and Vector then local Star = Handle:Clone() Star.Name = "Effect" local Mesh = Star:FindFirstChild("Mesh") Star.CanCollide = true Star.Transparency = 0 Star.Velocity = (Vector * Power) local BodyForce = Instance.new("BodyForce") BodyForce.force = Vector3.new(0, Star:GetMass() * 196.20, 0) BodyForce.Parent = Star local Creator = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator.Name = "Creator" Creator.Value = Player Creator.Parent = Star local HitScriptClone = HitScript:Clone() HitScriptClone.Disabled = false HitScriptClone.Parent = Star Debris:AddItem(Star, 15) Star.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") Star.CFrame = CFrame.new(Start) Star.CFrame = CFrame.new(Star.Position, Handle.Position) Star.CFrame = Star.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, (math.pi / 2), 0) Star.RotVelocity = Star.CFrame.lookVector * -100 end end
function Activated() if Tool.Enabled and Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent and Humanoid.Health > 0 then Tool.Enabled = false Fire:Play() local BaseVector = (Humanoid.TargetPoint - Torso.Position).unit ThrowStar(Torso.Position + BaseVector * 5.5, BaseVector) Handle.Transparency = 1 wait(FireRate) RandomizeStar() Handle.Transparency = 0 Tool.Enabled = true end end
function Equipped() Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") Torso = Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") if not Player or not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 or not Torso then return end end
function Unequipped() Handle.Transparency = 0 end
RandomizeStar() Tool.Grip = Grip
Tool.Activated:connect(Activated) Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Food = script.Parent
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Creator = Food:WaitForChild("Creator") HitSound = Food:WaitForChild("HitSound") EatScript = script:WaitForChild("EatScript") Stuck = false
function FindCharacterAncestor(Parent) if Parent and Parent ~= game:GetService("Workspace") then local humanoid = Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid then return Parent, humanoid else return FindCharacterAncestor(Parent.Parent) end end return nil end
Food.Touched:connect(function(Hit) if Hit and Hit.Parent and not Stuck then local Character, Humanoid = FindCharacterAncestor(Hit.Parent) if ((Character and Character ~= Creator.Value.Character and Humanoid and Humanoid.Health > 0) or not Character) then if Hit.Name ~= "Handle" and Hit.Name ~= "Effect" then Stuck = true local Weld = Instance.new("Weld") Weld.Part0 = Hit Weld.Part1 = Food Weld.C0 = Hit.CFrame:toObjectSpace(Food.CFrame) Weld.Parent = Food local BodyForce = Food:FindFirstChild("BodyForce") if BodyForce then BodyForce:Destroy() end HitSound:Play() if Character and Character ~= Creator.Value.Character and Humanoid and Humanoid.Health > 0 and not Humanoid:FindFirstChild(EatScript.Name) then local EatScriptClone = EatScript:Clone() local creator = Creator:Clone() creator.Value = Creator.Value creator.Parent = EatScriptClone local FoodClone = Instance.new("ObjectValue") FoodClone.Name = "Food" FoodClone.Value = Food FoodClone.Parent = EatScriptClone EatScriptClone.Disabled = false Debris:AddItem(EatScriptClone, 5) EatScriptClone.Parent = Humanoid end wait(5) Food:Destroy() end end end end)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Humanoid = script.Parent Character = Humanoid.Parent RightArm = Character:WaitForChild("Right Arm")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Creator = script:WaitForChild("Creator") Food = script:WaitForChild("Food") Eat = script:WaitForChild("EatAnim")
Damage = 20
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Name = "creator" Creator_Tag.Value = player Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) if Player then Backpack = Player:FindFirstChild("Backpack") if Backpack then Character.ChildAdded:connect(function(Child) wait() if Child and Child.Parent and Child:IsA("Tool") then Child.Parent = Backpack end end) for i, v in pairs(Character:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("Tool") then v.Parent = Backpack end end end end
Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 0 OldFood = Food.Value Food = Food.Value:Clone() OldFood:Destroy() RightGrip = Instance.new("Weld") RightGrip.Part0 = RightArm RightGrip.Part1 = Food RightGrip.C0 = CFrame.new(0, -1, 0, 1, 0, -0, 0, 0, 1, 0, -1, -0) RightGrip.C1 = CFrame.new(-0.550000012, 0.300000012, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 1, 0, 0) RightGrip.Parent = RightArm Food.Parent = Character EatAnim = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Eat) if EatAnim then EatAnim:Play() end wait(1.5) UntagHumanoid(Humanoid) TagHumanoid(Humanoid, Creator.Value) Humanoid:TakeDamage(Damage) if EatAnim then EatAnim:Stop() end Food:Destroy() Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 script:Destroy()
